name: SESAR Deployment Alliance
goal: The SESAR Deployment Alliance (SDA) is a group of air navigation service providers, airports and airlines that have been selected through a public calls for proposals by the European Commission (EC) in order to synchronise and coordinate the deployment phase of SESAR - the Single European Air Traffic Management Research Programme - and to act as the SESAR Deployment Manager in order to carry out the management level of the deployment governance, as foreseen in art.9 of Implementing Regulation No. 409/2013
interests: Budget, Competition, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Single European Sky initiative
Single European Sky ATM Research programme
Aviatio Strategy
MAWP C (2015) and subsequent amendments
